item.description:
Here's something you will enjoy!

Father Peter Bowes is a Christian Master Teacher
and a musician who travels the country giving seminars and workshops on all kinds of spiritual topics, you can check him out on Google Video. Just type in his name and there are several topics to choose from such Why do bad things happen to good people, Practical approaches to relationships and insights on attaining inner peace. He has authored 2 books, The
Word Within and Spiritual Astrology.

He will be our guest speaker at the Cenetr of Light . Join me in a relaxed environment to
enjoy stories from his books, mystical wisdom
teachings and live music.

In light,
Rev Gabrielle

Date: Thurs. Dec. 7th 7-9pm
Place: Center of Light
97 Perkins St
Jamaica Plain, MA
Cost: $10

Event fee:
USD10.00 per person
item.name: A Mystical Tea with Father Peter Bowes
